description:
The investment seeks to provide long term capital appreciation with capital preservation as a secondary objective.
 The fund will seek to achieve its investment objectives by investing in equity securities of companies domiciled in the U.S. or listed on a U.S. exchange. The fund's strategy seeks to provide exposure to U.S. listed equity securities and to avoid large, prolonged market losses and reduce volatility. It may also invest in inverse ETFs which seek to provide investment results that match a negative return of the performance of an underlying index like the S&P 500 Index. The fund is non-diversified.
